name: 1980s Star Wars Action Figures, Set of 4 - Boba Fett and 3 Other Bounty Hunters
description: This set of 4 vintage action figures is from the 1980s Kenner collection and features the fan favorite, Boba Fett. All figures include their original weapons / accessories. The lowdown... Make and Model: Four Vintage Star Wars Action Figures, 1979 - 1981. Includes the following figures (with date stamps): -Boba Fett with Blaster, 1979. -Bossk with Laser Rifle, 1980. -Dengar with Laser Rifle, 1980. -4-Lom (aka Zuckuss) with Laser Rifle, Backpack and Cloak, 1981. Specs: Each approximately 3 3/4" to 4" in height. Condition / Condition Issues: Overall very good condition. Boba Fett has some slightly loose legs, discolored limbs and some minor paint wear on his helmet and legs. Bossk and Dengar have some very slight / minor wear on the body--nothing major though. And 4-Lom's cloak is a tad discolored on the bottom (see pics). The rest of him, including his cloak and accessories, is in awesome shape! Missing Pieces: No missing pieces. Features: Totally bad*ss grouping of Star Wars bounty hunters! Includes the ever-popular, Boba Fett, in all his awesomeness. A highly collectible 4-pack indeed! -->All vintage Star Wars action figures in the shop are from my personal toy collection. Each has been carefully stored and taken care of for the past 25+ years. So go ahead--gift away without worry! If you're looking for more action figures, comic books, toys, collectibles and vintage items, be sure to check out my Etsy shop!

name: Dukes of Hazzard Diecast Car Set, 1980s Ertl - General Lee, Daisy Duke, Boss Hogg
description: Awesome throwback set of Dukes of Hazzard diecast car toys from Ertl, 1980-81. Relive the days of miraculous car jumps over houses and creeks or pretend you're being chased by Roscoe P. Coltrane! Features x3 General E. Lees (the '69 Dodge Charger driven by Bo and Luke), x2 Hazzard County police cruisers, Daisy Duke's Jeep and Boss Hogg's Cadillac. 7 cars total. All cars are in decent shape with normal wear and tear throughout. Some have a bit more wear than their counterparts. No missing wheels or broken parts though. One of the Dodge Chargers is in better shape than the others, as the Confederate flag graphics are clearer. Same goes with one of the police cruisers. Daisy Duke's Jeep and Boss Hogg's Caddy are both in great shape with normal wear and tear around the front and back fenders. The logo on the Jeep is still quite nice. And the animal horns on the hood of Boss Hogg's Caddy are still attached! The bottom of each car is marked "Ertl Company, Dyersville IA, Made in Hong Kong". Each car is from 1980-81. **This item is only available through our Big Cartel store.** If you're looking for more Hot Wheels, Matchbox or other vintage diecast cars and accessories, be sure to check out my Etsy shop!

categories.name: Hot Wheels, Matchbox & Other Diecast Cars

name: Pop Culture / 80s, Set of Books - Michael Jackson, Mr. T, Garfield, Gremlins & more
description: Totally rad set of 1980s books...it's like a Trivial Pursuit booty of awesomeness! Michael Jackson, Mr. T, Garfield, Diff'rent Strokes, Rubik's Cube, Knight Rider and more! Six totally 80's books are included: "Michael Jackson" Bio, 1984 "TV Superstars Scrapboook", 1984 "Rubik's Cube" Instructional, 1981 "Garfield", 1983 "Gremlins", 1984 "Archie", 1987 There's a tiny ripped spot on the cover of the Michael Jackson book and a Toys R Us price sticker on the Rubix Cube instructional booklet. But all the pages and covers are in good shape with no rips, tears or stains. **This item is only available through our Big Cartel store.** If you're looking for more vintage books, comic books and other vintage items, be sure to check out my Etsy shop!
